basisSet.dc:title: aug-cc-pV(5+d)Z
basisSet.dct:abstract: V5Z4P Valence Quintuple Zeta + Polarization on All Atoms

Note: for the symmetry equivalenced calculations the contaminants resulting from higher l-value functions that are present in atomic calculations performed in D2h symmetry were removed. For example, the d0 and d2+ contaminants present in the s irrep were removed.
